official_title: Migration Rates of Sutured vs Non-sutured Esophageal Stent Placement
inclusion_criteria:
* Able to provide informed consent
* Indication for esophageal stent placement
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 99 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Presence of any contraindication to esophageal stent placement
* Incarceration
* Inability to tolerate anesthesia
* Pregnant status
